dict.acceptation: 取得（权力）；承担，担任；假设，假定；呈现；

sent.orig: And what I assume you shall assume.
sent.trans: 我所认为的东西，你也将那样认为。

sent.orig: I assume you've decided against buying a new car.
sent.trans: 我猜想你已经下定决心不再买新车了。

sent.orig: Don't assume that your qualifications shine though -- spell them out for us.
sent.trans: 不要想当然地认为你的资料非常突出，向我们表达出来吧。

sent.orig: Astronomers tacitly assume that stars of the same luminosity and color all have the same mass.
sent.trans: 天文学家心照不宣地默认，光度和颜色都相同的恒星具有相同的质量。

sent.orig: Enterprise and institution are different property, assume the organization of different society function.
sent.trans: 企业和事业单位是不同性质，承担不同社会职能的组织。
